wxSkin Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
wxSkinButtonWxSkinButton is a simple skinned button class
wxSkinCheckBoxWxSkinCheckBox is a checkbox created through a skin
wxSkinChooserThis is a simple dialog to alow easy switching of skins
wxSkinEngineA class for loading, parsing and assigning skins
wxSkinFrameA "complex" frame class
wxSkinFrameBaseBase class for all skinned frames
wxSkinGaugeWxSkinGauge implements a simple gauge using skins
wxSkinPanelCreate a simple panel that will be shaped using a background image
wxSkinRadiobuttonWxSkinRadiobutton implements a simple radio button class. Emits wxRadioButton events
wxSkinSimpleFrameImplements a simple frame using one image for skinning
wxSkinSliderImplements a simple Slider control. When being dragged it emits a wxEVT_COMMAND_SLIDER_UPDATED. Currently on horizontal
wxSkinStaticTextWxSkinStaticText is a transparent text controls with an optional image label
wxSkinWindowWxSkinWindow is the abstract base class for all skinned controls in wxSkin
